scripts.scss-main: sass src/scss/cornell-governance.scss dist/css/cornell-governance.css && sass src/scss/cornell-governance-admin.scss dist/css/cornell-governance-admin.css
scripts.scss: npm run scss-main && npm run scss-charts
scripts.cssmin-main: cleancss -o dist/css/cornell-governance.min.css dist/css/cornell-governance.css && cleancss -o dist/css/cornell-governance-admin.min.css dist/css/cornell-governance-admin.css
scripts.cssmin: npm run cssmin-charts && npm run cssmin-main
scripts.uglify-main: uglifyjs -o dist/js/cornell-governance.min.js dist/js/cornell-governance.js && uglifyjs -o dist/js/cornell-governance-admin.min.js dist/js/cornell-governance-admin.js
scripts.uglify: npm run uglify-charts && npm run uglify-main
scripts.build:css: npm run scss && npm run cssmin
scripts.build:js: npm run webpack && npm run uglify
scripts.build: npm run composer:update && npm run remove:git && npm run build:css && npm run build:js
